Content: The dominant FTL methods should eveolve dynamically from the random
parameteres rolled during gamestart. So in some games Gates are
dominant in others they are a niche tech. They should also differ from
region to region. (E.g. in one region an ancient empire builds an
maintains a vast gate network, in another hyperlanes are abundant and
most polities travel using them, while in a third people get around
using dagerous and more inefficent jumps.)
